resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81438</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4356</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Barriers to Fair Trade</string>
            <string language="es">Obstáculos para el comercio justo</string>
            <string language="ga">Baic le Trádáil Fhéaráilte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sperren zum Messe-Handel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Barrières au commerce de foire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Barreiras ao comércio da feira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Barriere a commercio della fiera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εμπόδια στο δίκαιο εμπόριο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Producers and sellers of goods do not start with a "level playing field". As prices for raw materials  fall, small scale farmers in developing countries suffer. Even though the prices paid to the farmers decrease, we see little difference in prices of the goods on our shelves. There are many obstacles which prevent a just trading system. Students need to explore the international trade system and determine why it is unjust.  </string>
            <string language="es">Los productores y los vendedores de bienes no empiezan con un “campo de juego nivelado”. Los agricultores a pequeña escala de los países en desarrollo se ven muy perjudicados cuando los precios de las materias primas caen. Aunque los precios pagados a los</string>
            <string language="ga">Ní thosaíonn táirgeoirí agus díoltóirí earraí ar “pháirc imeartha cothrom”. Nuair a thiteann praghsanna amhearraí, bíonn feirmeoirí beaga i dtíortha i mbéal forbartha síos leis. Cé go bhfuil na praghsanna a íoctar le firmeoirí ag laghdú, ní fheicimid mórá</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">LCA</string>
            <string language="es">LCA. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">ATF</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Produzenten und Verkäufer von Waren beginnen 
nicht mit einem "waagerecht ausgerichteten Spielen 
auffangen". Während Preise für Rohstoffe fallen, 
leiden Kleinlandwirte in Entwicklungsländern. Obwohl die Preise
den Landwirten zahlten, verringern Sie sich, wir sehen wenig 
Preisunterschied der Waren auf unseren Regalen. Es gibt viele 
Hindernisse, die ein gerechtes handelndes System verhindern. 
Kursteilnehmer müssen das Handelsystem erforschen und 
feststellen, warum es unjust ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les producteurs et les vendeurs des marchandises 
ne commencent pas par "une zone de jeu de niveau". Pendant que 
les prix des matières premières premières tombent, les fermiers à 
échelle réduite dans les pays en voie de développement souffrent. 
Quoique les prix aient payé aux fermiers diminuez, nous voient 
peu d'écart de prix des marchandises sur nos étagères. Il y a
beaucoup d'obstacles qui empêchent un système marchand juste. 
Les étudiants doivent explorer le système de commerce 
international et déterminer pourquoi il est injuste.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os produtores e os sellers dos bens não começam
com "um campo jogando nivelado". Enquanto os preços para 
materiais crus caem, os fazendeiros da escala pequena em países 
tornando-se sofrem. Mesmo que os preços paguem aos fazendeiros 
diminua, nós vêem pouca diferença nos preços dos bens em nossas 
prateleiras. Há muitos obstáculos que impedem um sistema 
negociando justo. Os estudantes necessitam explorar o sistema do
comércio internacional e determinar porque é unjust.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I produttori ed i venditori delle merci non 
cominciano con "un campo da giuoco livellato". Mentre i prezzi 
per le materie prime cadono, i coltivatori della piccola scala in pæsi
in via di sviluppo soffrono. Anche se i prezzi hanno pagato ai 
coltivatori diminuisca, noi vedono poca differenza nei prezzi delle 
merci sulle nostre mensole. Ci sono molti ostacoli che 
impediscono un sistema commerciale giusto. Gli allievi devono 
esplorare il sistema di commercio internazionale e determinare perchè
è unjust.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι παραγωγοί και οι πωλητές των αγαθών δεν αρχίζουν με
ένα "πεδίο δραστηριότητας ίσων ευκαιριών". Καθώς οι αξίες
των πρώτων υλών πέφτουν, οι μικρής κλίμακας αγρότες στις 
αναπτυσσόμενες χώρες υποφέρουν. Ακόμα κι αν οι τιμές 
πράγματι καταβληθείσες στους αγρότες μειώνονται, βλέπουμε 
λίγη διαφορά στις τιμές των αγαθών στα ράφια μας. Υπάρχουν
πολλά εμπόδια που αποτρέπουν ένα δίκαιο σύστημα εμπορικών 
συναλλαγών. Οι σπουδαστές πρέπει να ερευνήσουν το διεθνές 
εμπορικό σύστημα και να καθορίσουν γιατί είναι άδικο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">LCA</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
